post:
Hey Guys,
Want to get your opinion on this site I just finished building.
Its quite simple and I want to keep it that way:

http://www.super-ping.com

Its a ping service and right now we have a few locations but are working on adding a lot more, I think we have a definite interface advantage on them.
If anyone wants to help us out with a location we are happy to leave sponsorship links on the server listing. But, most of all just want to see what you guys think.

Thanks
